metadata.synopsis: The party reacts to Halsin's death, commenting that they should investigate his corpse (prompting them to search his inventory/use Speak with Dead in order to find clues.)NOTE: the party may or may not be the ones who killed Halsin. They may not even have been aware he was Halsin if he dies in the worg pen while in bear form (transforming back into an elf corpse).

0.speaker: Player
0.text: That was no ordinary bear... better investigate the corpse.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Halsin died in bear form before revealing himself. His corpse turns into that of an elf, but the player likely isn't aware of who he is yet.NodeContext: Noting something's amiss - you just saw a bear turn into a man as it died.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Halsin's dead. I need to check his corpse for anything important.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Halsin died after he transformed from bear to elf in the worg pens and introduced himselfNodeContext: Grimly practical. The player may or may not have been the one who actually killed Halsin.
